DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether laser-assisted zona thin improve implantation rate woman advance age first IVF/ICSI cycle
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Laser-assisted Zona Thinning Implantation Rate Women Advanced Age
DOC.detailed_description: Registry procedures： 1 . It 's require sign inform consent form prior recruitment patient . 2 . Data collection entry need double check supervision . The outcome measure : implantation rate per embryo transfer miscarriage live birth
DOC.criteria: Age : 35y ≤age≤46y Basal FSH value : FSH≤10IU/L Day3 embryos transfer fresh IVF/ICSI cycle number embryos available transfer Day3 : ≥one embryo cycle thawed/warmed embryos biopsied PGD/PGS . cycle oocyte donation transfer . maximum number previous unsuccessful IVF attempt : ≥ 3 cycle ( transfer cycle ) cycle risk OHSS , fluid uterine cavity , abnormal endometrium , uterine abnormality , pelvic inflammation , acute maternal problem . One spouses abnormal karyotype ( include polymorphism )
